dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits shallow (1.5 m), crystal clear waters (pH 8.2) with a bottom of sand and some soft patches of silt.  Hides among submerged and floating aquatic vegetation.  Feeds on damselfly and dragonfly nymphs, other aquatic larvae, ostracods, copepods and snails.  Eggs measure 1.2-1.4 mm in diameter and hatch in about 9 days (Ref. 13498).  Not a seasonal killifish.  Is difficult to maintain in aquarium (Ref. 27139).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: demersal; freshwater; pH range: 7.2 - 8.0; dH range: 6 - 15

The following is a representative barcode sequence, the centroid of all available sequences for this species.


There is 1 barcode sequence available from BOLD and GenBank.

Below is the sequence of the barcode region Cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 (COI or COX1) from a member of the species.

See the BOLD taxonomy browser for more complete information about this specimen.
